titles.title: Protect Local Taxpayers Act of 2023
Protect Local Taxpayers Act of 2023
To amend title XIX of the Social Security Act to ensure the equitable treatment of political subdivisions contributing to State expenditures under the Medicaid program.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

bill.summary:
Protect Local Taxpayers Act of 2023
This bill specifies that, in order to receive certain Federal Medical Assistance Percentage (FMAP) increases under Medicaid, states with a local share requirement must agree to distribute funds to each locality in an amount that is proportional to the locality's Medicaid contributions.
